[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_deposit()] [Clock Manipulation] Clock at line 386 used for both reward updates and deposit execution - can attacker manipulate timestamp to get rewards from future epoch? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_deposit()] [Operator Freeze Check] assert_operator_not_freezed() at line 391 - if operator is frozen after deposit request was created, should deposit still be executable or blocked? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_deposit()] [Vector Length Mismatch] request_ids and max_shares_received vectors at lines 413-414 - if lengths don't match, does index_of at line 424 panic or use wrong slippage? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_deposit()] [Index Race] Lines 424-425 find index in request_ids, but if request_ids contains duplicates, which index is used for max_shares_received? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_deposit()] [Reward Buffer Once] update_reward_buffers() called once at line 418 for entire batch - if batch processes across epoch boundary, are later deposits using stale reward rates? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_deposit()] [Partial Execution] If batch processing fails midway (e.g., at request 5 of 10), are requests 1-4 already executed and state corrupted? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_deposit()] [Receipt Update Order] update_receipt_reward() called for each deposit at line 422 - if receipts share same receipt_id, can rewards be updated multiple times? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_deposit()] [DoS Vector] If request_ids contains 1000 entries, can attacker cause gas limit issues forcing transaction to fail and leave vault in DURING_OPERATION? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_deposit()] [Receipt ID Validation] receipt_id at line 440 - if attacker provides wrong receipt_id for the request_id, does cancel_deposit() validate ownership before canceling? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_deposit()] [Recipient Mismatch] recipient at line 441 - can operator cancel user's deposit and redirect funds to arbitrary recipient address? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_deposit()] [Cancel Window] Clock at line 442 used for timing checks - if deposit has locking window, can operator bypass lock by calling cancel after execution window started? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_deposit()] [Buffered Coin Transfer] Line 446 transfers buffered_coin to recipient - if recipient is a shared object or malicious contract, can it cause reentrancy? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_deposit()] [Double Cancel] If cancel_deposit() doesn't remove request from buffer, can operator call cancel_user_deposit() twice for same request_id? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_withdraw()] [Recipient Zero Address] Lines 474-478 check if recipient is address::from_u256(0) - if so, funds go to claimable_principal instead of transfer - can operator exploit this to lock user funds? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_withdraw()] [Max Amount Slippage] max_amount_received at line 457 - if vault loses value between request submission and execution, can user receive less than minimum expected? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_withdraw()] [Reward Update Race] Similar to deposit, reward updates at lines 462-465 - can race between withdraw requests cause reward double-spending? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_withdraw()] [Share Burn Verification] execute_withdraw burns shares - if withdraw_request has more shares than user's receipt, does burn fail or burn from wrong account? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_withdraw()] [Balance Into Coin] into_coin(ctx) at line 475 - if Balance is zero but conversion happens, does it create zero Coin that waste storage? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_withdraw()] [Claimable Principal Add] add_claimable_principal() at line 477 - if this is called multiple times for same user, does it accumulate correctly or overwrite? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_withdraw()] [Vector Length Mismatch] request_ids and max_amount_received at lines 488-489 must match length - if mismatch, does line 499 index_of cause panic? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_withdraw()] [Transfer Order] Withdrawals are transferred to recipients inside the loop (line 509) - if a transfer fails, do previous transfers remain valid or all rollback? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_withdraw()] [Free Principal Depletion] If batch withdraws more than available free_principal, does it fail immediately or after partial execution? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_withdraw()] [Reward Buffer Stale] update_reward_buffers() called once at line 493 - if batch takes multiple epochs to process (impossible but hypothetical), are reward rates stale? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_withdraw()] [Mixed Recipients] If some recipients are zero address and others are not, does mixing claimable_principal and transfers cause accounting errors? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_withdraw()] [Share Return] Function returns u256 (shares) at line 524 - who receives these returned shares and is it validated against receipt ownership? (Critical)
